metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3363 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Zend_XmlRpc in Zend Framework 1.x before 1.11.12 and 1.12.x before 1.12.0does not properly handle SimpleXMLElement classes, which allows remoteattackers to read arbitrary files or create TCP connections via an externalentity reference in a DOCTYPE element in an XML-RPC request, aka an XMLexternal entity (XXE) injection attack.

criterions.comment: zend-framework package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
